lead_paragraph: RUBENS--Denise, (nee Blum), age 90, died April 4, 2016. Loving wife of the late Stanley Rubens, mother of Monique Rubens Krohn and the late Rick Rubens. In-law to Douglas Korhn, M.D. Loving and proud grandmother of Alex and Meaghan. Treasured sister of Jacques Blum (deceased) and Rhoda Berman, and devoted aunt of Judy Siegel, Laurence Arnstein, Anne Blum and Laurie Arnould. Born in Paris, France, Denise fled her beloved city during WWII to come to the United States. She attended the Lycee Moliere, Dalton School and Hunter College, worked as a translator and resided in Hillsdale, NJ since 1955. Services at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ on Friday, April 8 at 11:30am. Donations may be made to Hearing Loss Association of America, 7910 Woodmont Avenue, Suite 1200, Bethesda, MD 20814. 1/3
